name: project_future_benefits
description: Calculate projected pension benefits at multiple future dates without changing the dossier status. Adds projection results to each policy. This is a bonus mutation.

projection_start_date.description: The start date for benefit projections.

projection_end_date.description: The end date for benefit projections.

projection_interval_months.description: The interval in months between projection points (e.g., 12 for yearly projections).
